'''2.18.2''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on February 15, 2024.</onlyinclude>

== Tweaks & improvements ==
* Various Realms page bug fixes.
* Various UI improvements & under the hood bug fixes.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-24056}} - Launcher string used for ConfirmDeleteAllQuickPlayDialog says "Entities" instead of "Entries"
* {{Bug|MCL-23976}} - When I start playing it asks me to enter a new username.
